merpi_desc: %USER's bloodsucker! Be it vampire fangs or something more grim, they are predatory and vicious. Maybe that's a good time...?

merpi_normal: %USER sinks their bloodsucking fangs into %TARGET's %T_PART, trying to turn it into a empty capri sun package!
merpi_flowery: %USER makes a very silly 'bleh' noise as they open their mouth wide and sink their bloodsucking fangs into %TARGET's %T_PART, GET THE STAKE!!
%USER teases their bloodsucking fangs across %TARGET's %T_PART's skin, tracing a noticible line across the affected area!

merpi_normal: %USER agressively draws their bloodsucking fangs across %TARGET's %T_PART!
merpi_flowery: %USER draws their bloodsucking fangs across %TARGET's %T_PART like a knife, leaving a small and broken line of blood droplets across the marked area!

merpi_normal: %USER lightly sinks their bloodsucking fangs into %TARGET's %T_PART, sipping silently!
merpi_flowery: %USER presses their jaws closed around %TARGET's %T_PART, sinking their bloodsucking fangs into them just enough to get a steady flow from %TARGET as they sip their essence quietly.

merpi_normal: %USER sinks their fangs into %TARGET's %T_PART, slurping noisily!
merpi_flowery: %USER digs their bloodsucking fangs into %TARGET's %T_PART just deep enough to get a steady flow of %TARGET's blood, slurpingly noisily as they do so!

merpi_normal: %USER eases their fangs down into %TARGET's %T_PART, feeding quietly on their essence!
merpi_flowery: %USER coaxes their fangs down into %TARGET's %T_PART in an attempt to feed.  They're quiet in their approach, and %TARGET may not even notice that they're being used as a human sized juice box.
merpi_repeat: %USER suckles with their vampire fangs on %TARGET's %T_PART!

merpi_normal: %USER jams their fangs down into %TARGET's %T_PART, feeding from them like a predator!
merpi_flowery: %USER shows no hesitation in jamming their fangs down hard into %TARGET's %T_PART, feeding off them like a predator that seeks to engorge itself on the meal at hand.
merpi_repeat: %USER feeds greedily with their vampire fangs on %TARGET's %T_PART!

merpi_normal: %USER holds %TARGET's %T_PART to their bloodsucking fangs, starting to drain them!
merpi_flowery: %USER holds %TARGET's %T_PART firmly to their bloodsucking fangs, it's clear that while they may be quiet about this whole ordeal they're not shy to empty %TARGET of all their vital liquids!
merpi_repeat: %USER is sucking the life out of %TARGET's %T_PART!

merpi_normal: %USER growls around %TARGET's %T_PART, their bloodsucking fangs drawing deep from them!
merpi_flowery: %USER growls like a deranged monster, bloodsucking fangs pressed deep into %TARGET's %T_PART as they pull deeply on %TARGET's blood.  Some of the precious liquid even dribbling out of their mouth as they do so!
merpi_repeat: %USER is sucking hte life out of %TARGET's %T_PART like a monster!
